attributes.additional_details: dear sir or madam,i would like to see the return to armed forces hospitals.after serving their country with their lives these people should expect the best possible care.armed forces personnel that need medical care end up in the queen elizebeth hospital in birmingham,& are not segregated from civilians,some of which may have a hatered of british troops.

rejection.details: Please see: Our troops Deserve to be treated in Military Hospitals
